Aki leads a normal life. She has friends, a family who cares about her, and a talent for writing. There's nothing seemingly wrong with her life, or herself for that matter. But when the the start of a new school year leads her to be in the same class as Yoshiko, a classmate a year older than her who still carries with her noticeable scars from the horrific burns she suffered from a fire, she begins to discover the best and worst in herself.  \n  \n2) The Whereabouts of the Prince  \nFor Haruka, Ami was a love at first sight. Everyone around him questions his tastes, calling her a plain Jane, but to him, it's as if she has a halo over her head. When he gets a friend to ask what her idea of the perfect guy is, she replies \"someone prince-like.\" He takes this literally, and this sets him off on a journey to become the \"Prince\" of her dreams.  \n  \n3) There's Something I Want to Ask You  \nSae receives a phone call from Ayumu, a former classmate of hers. She finds it odd, because it had been years since they had seen each other, and back when they went to the same high school, she had never even spoken to her. When they bump into each other at their high school reunion, she finds that Ayumu has changed completely from her former high school self—with the help of some plastic surgery. Take a trip to the West!\n\n...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!\n\n---\nLariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. fb374532-4d4b-461f-9d33-b4513e466ec8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"fb374532-4d4b-461f-9d33-b4513e466ec8","title":{"en":"Iinazuke Ryokan"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Beloved Mantleman"},{"en":"Fiancé Inn"},{"en":"Fiance Hotel"},{"en":"Naisho no Doukyonin"},{"en":"Secret Housemate"},{"en":"許嫁旅館"},{"en":"许嫁旅馆"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pl"],"description":{"en":"Collection of three short stories.  \n  \n- Fiancé Inn  \n\"Sanae has a fiance? Moreover, he is the young owner of a big Japanese Inn. Is she marrying into money?\" Sanae quickly begins her training to become a proprietress, but will she become more interested in the manager than the owner…!?  \n  \n- Naisho no Doukyonin (Secret Housemate)  \nSweet short story of a middle school boy in love with a high school girl. She is meticulous about wanting to know everything about the person she is dating. Her emotion conflict when she meets this middle school boy, who challenges her way of thinking about relationship. The author diligently places the character in a muddled, flustered, and distraught air of insecure emotions. She feels baffled because she can't comprehend why she likes him, even though she knows nothing about him.  (From: Dragon Voice Project)  \n  \n- Also published in *Chokotto H na Koi Monogatari*. Can she add a little spice to his life, or will she make his pot boil over?  \n  \nVol. 3 Sold to the Sheikh  \n  \nSupermodel Charmaine never expected someone like Dubar’s Prince Ali to bid five million dollars for a dinner date with her. He’s a rich international playboy—just the sort of man she despises. She sees the fire burning in his eyes and thinks he must want revenge since she rejected him a year earlier. One thing’s for sure, this is going to be a night to remember!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E4%BA%94%E5%84%84%E3%83%89%E3%83%AB%E3%81%AE%E6%84%9B%E4%BA%BA-%E6%81%8B%E3%81%AF%E3%83%9D%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0-%E2%85%A2-%E3%83%8F%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AC%E3%82%AF%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B3%E3%83%9F%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF%E3%82%B9-JET-ebook/dp/B00FKP8MQY/ref=sr_1_37?qid=1556292611\u0026refinements=p_27%3A%E3%83%9F%E3%83%A9%E3%83%B3%E3%83%80%E3%83%BB%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sr=1-37\u0026text=%E3%83%9F%E3%83%A9%E3%83%B3%E3%83%80%E3%83%BB%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC","mu":"134219"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}}]}

The manga's healthy touch, which is a little different from the usual sports genre, was praised and won the first Kodansha Children's Manga Award. (The complete 9-volume version of Shonen Sunday is now on sale from Shosha.) This book will be published in the school year magazine \"Elementary School First (Second Grade)\" about six years after the series ended in Shonen Sunday. This is the first book that compiles the original works of the same title that were serialized. The story carefully depicts how Kintaro and his friend Kuro-chan, who join the Tokyo Gold, which belongs to a fictional professional baseball league, compete against rival players and American teams. Above all, you can get a glimpse of the author's ideal view of manga through the panel layout and dialogue arranged for school year magazines. fc4b24bd-411b-49f7-bd9f-0d0bb5662cf7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"fc4b24bd-411b-49f7-bd9f-0d0bb5662cf7","title":{"en":"The Reader and Protagonist Definitely Have to Be in True Love"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Reader + Protagonist"},{"en":"TRAPDHTBITL"},{"th":"นักอ่านกับพระเอกน่ะ ต้องคู่กันอยู่แล้วนี่!?"},{"zh":"读者和主角绝逼是真爱"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"An internet troll who wanted attention, the reader criticized his favorite web novel, saying: “The protagonist is dumb and the author is s*upid.”  \n  \nAuthor: “… Got it.”  \n  \nUnfortunately for him, the author actually listened to his (troll) feedback. I did?\"\n\n\"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!\"\n\n\"Hold on! No! Wait!\"\n\n---\n[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)","ko":"과거 언젠가 읽었던 것도 같은 소설에서 환생했다.\n멀지 않은 미래에 악역의 약혼녀가 될 운명이지만 그거야 뭐...\n내가 어떻게 사는지에 따라 달라지는 거 아니겠어?\n\n“제 이상형은 키 190에, 잘 생기고 부자에 백작 이상의 작위를 가졌으며\n나이가 들어도 뱃살이 나오지 않는 남자예요!”\n\n그런데 남편감을 미처 찾기도 전에 어린 남자 주인공의 목숨을 구해버렸다?\n순탄하던 인생 계획은 그 이후부터 자꾸만 꼬여가는데!\n\n\"미안하지만, 아리엘은 내가 세상에서 제일 예쁘고\n잘생겨서 눈을 뗄 수 없다고 했다.\"\n\"네? 제가요?\"\n\"시, 실례가 많았습니다. 제 청혼은 잊어주시길!\"\n\"잠깐! 아냐! 기다려요!\"\n\n실연의 상처에 뛰어나간 영식을 허망하게 바라보는 날 보며\n그가 비죽 입꼬리를 끌어올렸다.\n\n대체 뭐야 이거?\n\n---\n[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)"},"links":{"engtl":"https://tapas.io/series/this-male-lead-wont-let-me-be/info","mu":"194285","nu":"the-hero-is-standing-in-my-way","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
